title: Border, 1920–50
creditline: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
description: Textile trimming, gimp or passementerie design. A short green fringe hangs below a beaded band. Red tassels, alternating two and one, spaced at regular intervals, in front of fringe. Floral rosette with connecting scroll above beads. Printed in green, red and yellow on a pale green or gray ground.

participants.person_name: The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1920–50.
1920–50. Block-printed. Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology. 1998-75-84.
